Author: Luckbox Flx
Title: [ANN][ICO] Luckbox - Esports done right!
Body: What is Luckbox?  https://luckbox.com/  See what Luckbox is all about and read our white paper https://luckbox.com/docs/1181/lb-wp.pdf   If reading 50 pages scares you, here is a good Luckbox's overview: https://luckbox.com/docs/1181/lb-presentation.pdf   Check out our roadmap and get on boat with us! https://blog.luckbox.com/luckbox-roadmap-published-ddb18cbd141c     Luckbox Product Section: result of Luckbox's elite dev team   Have a first glance at our product prototype and play this video: https://blog.luckbox.com/video-first-glimpse-of-luckbox-prototype-ba0302120273     Luckbox's Advisors a.k.a the A-Team    Luckbox Announces Advisory Board Appointments Ahead of Initial Coin Offering (ICO) https://www.webwire.com/ViewPressRel.asp?aId=219270    David Sarge, iGaming Innovation Expert, is now part of our top advisor team. See press release for more information: http://www.igamingbusiness.com/press/luckbox-announces-david-sargeant-advisory-role?utm_content=buffer2514b&utm_medium=social&utm_source=linkedin.com&utm_campaign=buffer   Steven Grove, digital currency expert, Sigwo Technologies Founder. Sigwo founder Steven Grove joins Luckbox advisory team: https://blog.luckbox.com/sigwo-founder-steven-grove-joins-luckbox-advisory-team-f484ed6b4abe    Partnerships   A partnership every company and hodler would dream of! Luckbox enrolled in Google's Top Tier programme: https://blog.luckbox.com/luckbox-enrolled-in-google-top-tier-programme-fd7ae6762353   Speak to our founders and team directly  You can speak to Luckbox's Founders and some key team members everyday on our official Telegram Channel: https://t.me/joinchat/FDjS9EJHnwhynuK16GK8HQ    Another way to speak to the team is to connect to our Discord Server: https://discordapp.com/invite/VNtVEcb    Check on our latest announcements on our Telegram Announcement Channel: https://t.me/luckboxnews    And obviously, we are on Twitter: https://twitter.com/luckboxgg?lang=en   And Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LuckboxGG/   Our subreddit is full of press releases and interviews of our CEO, Lars Lien, check it out! https://www.reddit.com/r/luckbox/   Pre-sale and promotions  Our pre-sale is live, check out the details on this link to contribute and be part of the Luckbox adventure:  https://blog.luckbox.com/luckbox-presale-details-234c7e099938    Earn your luck and take a free share of $50,000 worth of Luckbox tokens by taking part to our airdrop promotion:  https://blog.luckbox.com/earn-free-tokens-in-the-luckbox-airdrop-300b79f5ea3a   Luckbox Token Giveaway competition, get creative for a chance to get free tokens:  https://blog.luckbox.com/luckbox-bounty-earn-your-luck-to-win-free-tokens-77a02a73d5ac

Title: [ANN][ICO] Luckbox - Esports done right!
Body: https://blog.luckbox.com/luckbox-crowdsale-dates-d83b6ed646c5  According to this update presale is started from Monday, January 22. So this is going on or not get started yet. What is the hard cap of this crowdsale if $20M for the presale. Where I can find these details OP is missing that important thing.

Author: douinaho
Title: [ANN][ICO] Luckbox - Esports done right!
Body: A very exciting and interesting project and a great team team in the field. But I want to know if there is a bounty program?

Author: Luckbox Flx
Title: [ANN][ICO] Luckbox - Esports done right!
Body: Thank for your interest and comments, they will improve our communication. Note that our BitcoinTalk thread is still under construction as we favoured first other ways of communicating. The Pre-sale has started already and is still live. $20,000,000 is our overall hardcap.  As you can read here: https://blog.luckbox.com/luckbox-presale-details-234c7e099938   "Luckbox raised $4m from strategic investors and $11m is allocated for the presale stage. The remaining $5m tokens are reserved for the public crowdsale."

Author: Luckbox Flx
Title: [ANN][ICO] Luckbox - Esports done right!
Body: Edit: Thanks for your kind comments by the way. We can't wait to ride the esports wave fully.   There will very soon be promotions and bounty programs, keep up to date by joining our Telegram channel, our Discord server or our subreddit. We will be more active on these media than this bitcointalk thread.

Author: Luckbox Flx
Title: [ANN][ICO] Luckbox - Esports done right!
Body: Hey guys, our Luckbox token giveaway competitions are live. an entrant can win up to $12,000 worth of luckbox tokens, check it out: https://blog.luckbox.com/luckbox-bounty-earn-your-luck-to-win-free-tokens-77a02a73d5ac

Author: Luckbox Flx
Title: [ANN][ICO] Luckbox - Esports done right!
Body: I am happy to answer you but it is obviously better that you make up your own mind by checking our subreddit and blog section, or more broadly, our online presence.  I am part of the team and I can tell you, there is no better team in the esports sector at the moment. Founders (and I) took our experience from PokerStars among other brands (check our news and articles to know more about our founders) and they have been successful in the crypto world for years.  You can meet our dev team on our blog too, there is no more dedicated, passionate and professional than them.  We just partnered with Google and have a top Google advisor on board with us to help that partnership run smoothly first and much more afterwards. Steven Grove joined our advisors team too, he is the founder of Sigwo Technologies. So many other top advisors are on board with us, check them out too.  Our main focus is security, regulation and integrity to make sure our business is sustainable on the long run in this crazy crypto world. We offer a unique opportunity to contribute in our project with a dual token structure.  Check our white paper, our roadmap, our team and our prototype product presentation thanks to the OP links. You can talk to our founders directly on Telegram too, the whole team is very available. Don't hesitate to do so.

Author: lukikato
Title: [ANN][ICO] Luckbox - Esports done right!
Body: interesting and good projects. I want to ask: 1) what is the purpose of your project? and when ico started? and I'm also waiting for the bounty campaign program

Author: Luckbox Flx
Title: [ANN][ICO] Luckbox - Esports done right!
Body: First sorry we have not replied too fast.  1) As mentioned in our white paper, we are solving the problems any esports bettor are facing when wanting to bet on esports. Security, regulation compliant, integrity and easy and fun user experience thanks to the power of cryprotcurrency and its fast and reliable transactions. The platform will be dedicated to esports betting with a comprehensive social and competitive panel of game options. Moreover, we will always strive towards the innovation the blockchain technology and regulations allow us to do.  For the bounty campaign, it just ended and was advertised in the OP as well as I made an additional post here to warn the Bitcointalk community. Sorry if you missed it but come to our Telegram channel, some announcements are about to be made.
